text: The Young Master () is a 1980 Hong Kong action comedy movie directed by Jackie Chan (who also stars) and starring Yuen Biao, Tien Feng, Fung Fung, Lee Hoi- sang, Hwang In-Shik. It was distributed by Golden Harvest. ==Other websites== * * Category:1980 action movies Category:1980 comedy movies Category:Hong Kong action movies Category:Hong Kong comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Jackie Chan Category:Golden Harvest movies
title: The Young Master
